name: One Click Rumble
description:
A fast-paced 2D top down space shooter! Shoot as many enemies as possible and keep an eye on power-ups. Some of them are time bound!!!

Controls:

Move movement - Controls direction of your spacecraft

Space Bar - Fire 

Space bar hold - Moves towards mouse pointer + Fire at a steady rate

NOTE: WebGL version might take some time to load. I would suggest you download the executable instead. Also, I only have access to Windows and Linux machines, so I am not sure if Mac build works or not.
